operations.notes:
Creates a user in the Account associated with the User Authentication Token.

The operation requires a User Data value.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.CREATE_USER ALWAYS

The operation returns a User Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to create new Users, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Exception

If the User Data value provided is not valid, due to duplicate information or missing required data, the following exception is returned:

  • User Exception if the provided data is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing User account with new user account information.

The operation requires a User Data value.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - to update Users other than the requestor.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_USER_PROFILE CONDITIONAL - to update requstor's User information.
Rights required to Manage Another's User Data values for specific fields
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_CREDENTIALS CONDITIONAL - to update another's User Credentials.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_ALLOCATIONS CONDITIONAL - to update another's User Group Allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_BUSINESS_RULES CONDITIONAL - to update another's Rules governing how they may reserve resources.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_DELEGATES CONDITIONAL - to update another's Delegates, people who can make reservations on behalf of the User.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_RIGHTS CONDITIONAL - to update another's Authorization Rule Rights.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_NAME CONDITIONAL - to update another's User Name.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_BUSINESS_ATTRIBUTES CONDITIONAL - to update another's Business Attributes, such as Department, Title, etc.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_EMAIL CONDITIONAL - to update another's Email preferences.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_ROLE CONDITIONAL - to update another's User Role.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_LANGUAGE CONDITIONAL - to update another's User Language.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_CONTACT_INFO CONDITIONAL - to update another's Contact Information.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_ONE_CLICK CONDITIONAL - to update another's One Click settings, which allow the User to make a reservation of predetermined resources for a predetermined time with a single click.
Rights required to Manage Own User Data values for specific fields
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_CREDENTIALS CONDITIONAL - to update one's own User Credentials
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_ALLOCATIONS CONDITIONAL - to update one's own User Group Allocations.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_BUSINESS_RULES CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Rules governing how they may reserve resources.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_DELEGATES CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Delegates, people who can make reservations on behalf of the User.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_RIGHTS CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Authorization Rule Rights.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_NAME CONDITIONAL - to update one's own User Name.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_BUSINESS_ATTRIBUTES CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Business Attributes, such as Department, Title, etc.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_EMAIL CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Email preferences.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_ROLE CONDITIONAL - to update one's own User Role.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_LANGUAGE CONDITIONAL - to update one's own User Language.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_CONTACT_INFO CONDITIONAL - to update one's own Contact Information.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_ONE_CLICK CONDITIONAL - to update one's own One Click settings, which allow the User to make a reservation of predetermined resources for a predetermined time with a single click.

The operation returns a User Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to update Users, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Not Found

If a matching User cannot be found for the User Data value provided, the following exception is returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the User identified by the User Data value cannot be found.

User Exception

If the User Data value provided is not valid, due to duplicate information or missing required data, the following exception is returned:

  • User Exception if the provided data is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Gets all User Attributes defined for the account for the application authentication token. A User Attribute describes additional custom attributes for a User profile that are not pre-defined attributes within the AgilQuest system.

This operation returns a User Attribute Type Wrapper with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
userAttributeTypes User Attribute List of User Attribute elements. The list is empty if no attributes are found

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to delete Users, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Gets all Credentials Type values for users associated with the account for the application authentication token. Credentials Type values are associated with the User Credentials Data values of a user profile and are defined in the Agilquest system database.

This operation returns a Credentials Type Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
credentialsTypes List of Credentials Type values All Cedentials Type values associated with the Application.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the Account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Integer ID of the User to update with an image
parameters.name: sysidUser

parameters.description: : {@link MultipartFormDataInput} value with the image file information
parameters.name: _input

operations.notes:
Uploads an Image file for the User identified by System ID. Images are interpreted into User Image values. A valid image may be a PNG, JPG, TIFF, BMP or other valid image format.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

Rights Required
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - Required if the Requestor is updating the Image for another User.
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_OWN_USER_PROFILE CONDITIONAL - Required if the Requestor and User identified are the same.

Note: The user must either be the SystemAdmin, or the user's HomeAccount must match the SYSID_Account of the Resource.

This operation requires an application/octet-stream HTTP attachment with appropriate Content-Disposition headers.

This operation may include an OPTIONAL query parameter sysidUser=#. If no query parameter is provided, the operation adds the image to the calling authenticated User's profile.

This operation returns a User Image value with the URL of the image hosted within the AgilQuest CDN.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Not Found

If the User with a matching System ID is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the User cannot be found.

Invalid Image File

If the provided file is not a valid image file, or the User information provided is invalid, the following exception is returned:

  • Required Data Exception if the image file is not valid.
  • User Exception if the User Data is not valid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Each User may have a list of other Users associated with their User Account. This offers a convenient way for Users to search a list of other Users for whom they make Reservations. The User information is returned as a list of User Views describing the User Account information.

This operation retrieves all User Views listed in the My People attribute of the User identified by the User System ID path parameter.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - If the validated requestor has a different ID from the user identified by the sysidUser parameter

This operation may include an OPTIONAL query parameter sysidUser=#. If no query parameter is provided, the operation retrieves the data for the calling authenticated User.

This operation returns a User View Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
views List of User View values View of user profile information for Users listed in the calling User's saved People profile.
hasAdditional Boolean value Indicates in paginated calls if there are additional views which can be requested.
nextStartRow Integer value Index of next row at which to start request for additional values.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the User's account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Each User may have a list of Room Resources associated with their User Account. This offers a convenient way for Users to search a list of preferred Room Resources for Room Reservations. The Room information is returned as a list of Room Views describing the Room Resources.

This operation retrieves all Room Views listed in the My Rooms attribute of the User identified by the User System ID path parameter.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - If the validated requestor has a different ID from the user identified by the sysidUser parameter

This operation may include an OPTIONAL query parameter sysidUser=#. If no query parameter is provided, the operation retrieves the data for the calling authenticated User.

This operation returns a Room View Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
views List of Room View values View of room resource information of User's preferred resources.
hasAdditional Boolean value Indicates in paginated calls if there are additional views which can be requested.
nextStartRow Integer value Index of next row at which to start request for additional values.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the User's account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : Object containing User SYSID or Email Address to use for finding the desired User Data element.
parameters.name: _request

operations.notes:
Retrieves an existing User Data profile as identified by the provided search criteria.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.VIEW_ANOTHERS_USER_PROFILE CONDITIONAL - Needed if viewing another's profile
AuthRuleType.VIEW_OWN_USER_PROFILE CONDITIONAL - Needed if viewing own profile

The operation requires a Search User Request value with the following fields:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
sysidUser Integer System ID value of the requested User. CONDITIONAL - required if no email address provided. The System ID of the User for whom to search.
emailAddress Integer System ID value of the requested User. CONDITIONAL - required if no User System ID is provided. String email address of the User for whom to search.

The operation returns a User Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to the requested User profile or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Not Found

If no user can be found matching the given criteria, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if no Users were found matching the given criteria.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Allows a user to self-register within a forum that allows self-registration. The User created will have a status of UNVERIFIED LOGIN. Forum properties are used to determine the default UserGroups and Role for this user.

This operation requires a Self Register User Data to create an Unverified Login user.

This operation returns a User Data value representing the User.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the Forum which the user is attempting to register to does not allow self registration, is not an active forum, or is an invalid forum account.

Password Exception

If the password value provided is not valid, due to duplicate information or missing required data, the following exception is returned:

Password Exception if the password provided data is invalid.


User Data Error

If the new user data provided for registration is not complete or valid, the following exception is returned:

User Exception if the User Data provided is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Update the User Preferences for the User identified by the given SYSID and the current application interfacing with Phoenix.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - Needed if updating another's preferences.

This operation may include an OPTIONAL query parameter sysidUser=#. If no query parameter is provided, the operation updates the calling authenticated User's preferences.

This operation requires a User Preferences Update value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

User Not Found

If the provided user SYSID cannot be found, the follwowing exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the provided user cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Retrieves the User Preferences for the User identified by the given SYSID.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_USERS CONDITIONAL - Needed if updating another's preferences.

This operation may include an OPTIONAL query parameter sysidUser=#. If no query parameter is provided, the operation retrieves the calling authenticated User's preferences.

This operation returns a User Preferences Wrapper with the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
preferences User Preferences Data List of User Preferences Data elements. Each element is a preference for a different application.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Not Found

If the User with a matching System ID is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the User cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : @PathParam("userId") Integer ID of the user to delete.
parameters.name: sysidUser

operations.notes:
Deletes the existing User identified by the sysidUser path parameter. If the User is successfully deleted, the server returns a 204 OK response. If the User identified by the sysidUser value does not exist, a NotFoundException is returned.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.DELETE_USER ALWAYS

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to delete Users, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Not Found

If a User with the Sysid value matching the Sysid value used as the path parameter of this endpoint cannot be found in the System, the following exception is returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the User identified by the Sysid value cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
